Project.Brief history of your project and organi: Wlyl Ltd is an online training sharing platform. It is specifically designed for enterprise users. Founded at the end of 2019, when distributed office has become a trend around the world, we have created a video online course live broadcast platform for companies that need to train their employees. We can provide live broadcast, recorded broadcast, video, playback and other service options. We have served nearly 100 companies and have reached partnerships with dozens of companies. We are committed to providing live training services to more companies.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Business  training courses, online course recording videos
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, Europe
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Lotus built-in data transfer
